CYm0n is a platformer puzzle game in which your goal is to reach as high as possible.

The platforms will appear and show you a serie of colors on which to step, just like the classic game Simon.

As you succeed, new platforms will appear and the series becomes progressively longer and more complex.

As you scale, you'll get rewards which will unlock special goodies.

Take care to step in the right color, if you fail you will fall and die.
